function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Weak positive effect of interpersonal globalisation on COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 due to weak effect of interpersonal globalisation","Mitigation":"Implement strict travel restrictions and quarantine measures","Technologies":"Travel tracking and monitoring technology","People":"Global population","Owner":"Government and health authorities"},{"Description":"Influence of financial globalisation on COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Financial globalisation contributing to the spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Regulate international financial transactions and monitor capital flows","Technologies":"Financial transaction monitoring, surveillance systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"International regulatory bodies, financial institutions"},{"Description":"Prominence of trade globalisation in suppressing COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Dependence on trade globalisation for COVID-19 suppression","Mitigation":"Diversify trade partnerships and strengthen domestic production","Technologies":"Trade data analytics, supply chain management systems","People":"Global population","Owner":"Trade ministries, business associations"}]}
